original_text: A person may want to give a gift to the Lord. That gift must be a male animal from his group of animals. It must be perfect. He must burn the whole animal as a gift to the Lord. The person must bring it to the door of the Tent of Meeting. If he does, the Lord will accept his gift.
korean_text: 그 예물이 소의 번제이면 흠 없는 수컷으로 회막 문에서 여호와 앞에 기쁘게 받으시도록 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: A person may want to give a gift to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 주님께 선물을 드리고 싶을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: That gift must be a male animal

sentences.korean_translation: 그의 동물 무리에서 나온 것이어야 한다

sentences.original_text: He must burn the whole animal
as a gift to the Lord
to the door of the Tent of Meeting
the Lord will accept his gift
